urls.title: Where are old aircraft laid to rest? - Cathay Pacific - Sustainable Development
urls.description: Cathay’s aircraft are reused instead! Watch how Cathay’s aircraft are recycled when they are retired. The aircrafts that carry our people and customers safely across the world hold a special place in our hearts and when the time comes to retire them, we make sure they are put to good use and not just put … Read more

data.text: Like people, our planes must retire eventually. But even then, they still play an essential role in your travels. 💚 Because, as a company that advocates sustainability, we systematically recycle our retired aircraft, reusing or recovering up to 90% of their components. https://t.co/irv3crVYfc

urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We're waiving ticket change and cancellation fees, so you can rearrange your plans easily. View our special ticketing guidelines to learn more. Contact your travel agent directly to organise changes. If you have questions that require a response, please contact us for assistance. Your feedback will help us improve our website experience. Your feedback will help us improve our website experience.

data.text: We expect the severe tropical storm #MaOn will disrupt our operation schedule to/from Hong Kong on 25 August. Please ensure your contact details are up to date in Manage Booking to receive the latest flight updates and  check your flight status before coming to the airport. https://t.co/tKCD7Yn1KK

urls.title: A word of thanks to all of our people | Cathay
urls.description: Showing appreciation and sharing stories of all our people who have given their time, energy and dedication to keeping Hong Kong safe.

data.text: Now, we are progressively bringing the fleet home to continue their next journey. How do we manage this unprecedented operation involving multiple locations around the world. With lots of planning, coordination, and even more heart.

Throughout the pandemic, ensuring our passengers’ safety has always been our priority. A significant part of this effort came in keeping idle aircraft in the Alice Springs desert protected and fly ready.

https://t.co/Ep0DrutRb6 via @YouTube https://t.co/vNDAI8Y9Vk

urls.title: Cathay Stories: Preparing For Take-Off 國泰故事：準備再起航
urls.description: Throughout the pandemic, ensuring our passengers’ safety has always been our priority. A significant part of this effort came in keeping idle aircraft in the...

data.text:
“I truly believe it is more than ‘just a job’ 💪🏻. Like many of us at Cathay, we are excited to once again welcoming people from the world to our home, and helping passengers back into the air, flying towards their next destinations!✈️”

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond #CathayPeople
“We helped him board and he made it to his daughter's wedding on time! Something I’m sure both of us will never forget.🎉"

“One time, a passenger missed the flight to his daughter’s wedding. He was so anguished and sad. It would have surely been a lifelong regret. I decided that I could not let it happen.” With the team’s support, Yuly was able to secure a new flight in time.
“The work here is dynamic and unique. When we solve challenges coming our way, it sometimes feels like we are creating magical moments.🪄” Yuly says.

Meet Yuly Wong, our Customer Service Officer in the Premium Service Team. Yuly makes sure passengers receive the most efficient and personalised services upon departure and arriving the airport. https://t.co/BgGHUDUgPh

Hong Kong at night. Now there’s a sight.🌃 How many of these places have you checked out?📸

📸 Instagram @ _kash.pro

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond https://t.co/Zln7bxY1Ij

Our commitment to in-flight waste reduction has led us to turn recycled bottles into blankets. So you can rest easy knowing you’re flying more sustainable.

Discover more of our sustainable solutions at https://t.co/cjIfODDDQm

#GreenCathay #flygreener

data.text:
Whether for passenger or cargo flights, we wholeheartedly believe the Third Runway will promise new possibilities for everyone. Here’s to the new heights it will take our home of Hong Kong. 🎉

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond
The aircraft that marked this occasion was none other than our ‘Queen of the Skies’. ✈️ Arriving from Shanghai, our 747 freighter landed at the new runway as part of the operation familiarisation.
It’s a huge day for us at Cathay Pacific! This morning, we landed the very first commercial flight at the new Third Runway of the Hong Kong International Airport.🇭🇰 https://t.co/iou4Sw4Fg0

No two holidays are alike, but the same cannot be said about travel folks. We’re a lot more similar than you think. How many of these travel musings can you relate to 💭? Let us know yours in the comments.

#CathayPacific #MoveBeyond https://t.co/YFNpwV8ucA

Route-specific flight suspension mechanism in Hong Kong is suspended, effective immediately. we have been working progressively and safely to resume more passenger and cargo flights for our customers. Please visit: https://t.co/xnvxTgY9mL

urls.title: Where We're Flying | Cathay Pacific
urls.description: We’re still flying | Here you’ll find the most up-to-date information regarding our current and upcoming flights.

data.text:
Each work is its own, but they all share the city’s bold personality. How many of these places have you visited?

📸 Instagram @ _conradlee & @ storm_ha; @ i_ha_ruth; @ ls.milkkkkk; @ uhcimat

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond

Hong Kong has always been a canvas to tell your story 🎨, and we’re not speaking metaphorically. For one, Sheung Wan’s Shing Wong Street is famous for its epic and grammable street art. You also don’t want to miss Sai Ying Pun’s ArtLane and Kam Tin’s Mural Village. https://t.co/C4qRL7K3oa

data.text: Typhoon #Chaba is currently affecting our flight operations into and out of HK with possible disruptions, delays, diversions, cancellations to some of our flights. Please check the status of your flight before coming to the airport. Details: https://t.co/CIs9YFByiH

urls.title: Typhoon Chaba is affecting our flights to/from Hong Kong
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We're waiving ticket change and cancellation fees, so you can rearrange your plans easily. View our special ticketing guidelines to learn more. Contact your travel agent directly to organise changes. If you have questions that require a response, please contact us for assistance. Your feedback will help us improve our website experience. Your feedback will help us improve our website experience.

data.text:
At the end of the day, everything is worthwhile for Alvin and his team. It is also thanks to them, we get to enjoy blockbusters inflight even before they are screening in Hong Kong!🎉.

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond #CathayPeople

You may be surprised with the work and planning that go into releasing movies inflight! It starts with selection, then working around the clock to liaise with studios worldwide. There are also subtitle creation and adding the titles with the tech team.
This drives Alvin’s dedication to perfecting IFE, from getting the best movie titles to the smallest details, such as the background music when IFE is not in use.😯
“Once the passengers are aboard, IFE is perhaps the biggest source of entertainment, which gives us the responsibility to offer the best and unique experience that meets their expectations.”

Meet the team: Alvin Lai, our Customer Experience Manager - Entertainment, who looks after the inflight entertainment (IFE) experience! Whether it be a film, TV show, or the playlist that relaxes you during a flight - everything is carefully curated by Alvin and his team. https://t.co/DTd1iwCQ4D

Since you’re already familiar with IATA codes 🌟, can you guess which airport has the ICAO code VHHH? 
(⚠️ The clue is in the photo!)

📸 Instagram @ ihikhi

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond

data.text:
✈️ ICAO codes are used by pilots and industry professionals alike for referring to airports.

💺 IATA codes are used by airlines as they relate to passengers. Think of the ‘HKG’ on your boarding pass when flying to Hong Kong 🇭🇰.

urls.title: Sustainable development at Cathay Pacific | Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Cathay Pacific’s approach to sustainable development and climate change.

data.text: At Cathay, we are committed to using resources consciously and reducing waste. That is why we give our treasured past a re-energised future by turning them into a series of new limited-edition merchandise. Can you guess what we upcycled? https://t.co/W6jyqSXFIp

Just key in your travel destination and date, and we’ll list out all the related travel restrictions for you. Nice!💫

Learn more: https://t.co/2s72WG3tpW

#CathayPacific #MoveBeyond

urls.title: Travel Restrictions - COVID-19 Updates - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We know travel restrictions may change at short notice. That’s why we’re doing everything we can to keep you up-to-date with current COVID-19 travel requirements to help you plan ahead. Before you travel, make sure to review the latest travel restrictions to ensure you’re eligible to fly. We also highly recommend checking the official government website of your destination country for the latest information. Travel

data.text: Keeping up to date with all the travel restrictions is no one’s idea of fun. But we’ve got some good news for you, global travellers! 🤝We’ve launched our travel restrictions widget on the Cathay Pacific website. https://t.co/uBWEV0NClH
